song.title: Can ever be like before
song.info:
Lyrics: Looking at the sky your image everywhere Thinking all the time how could I show you that I care If only I could have you that's all I desire But all I have is feeling burning in my heart like fire I know that you want that it would be like before Maybe you will see me when you open the door All I need is to know that you are here And all the bad thoughts in my head will disappear
Can ever be like before
